title: Week 4 Matchups + The Wheel of Shame - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/1
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a Win in Week 4! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Jaguars/Bengals game, and Jason spins the “Wheel of Shame” in the Fantasy Faceoff segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 1st, 2021.
  
 (03:45) - FootClan Friday
 (05:50) - Thursday Night Football Recap
 (11:50) - NFL News & Injury Updates
 (18:30) - Fantasy Forecast
 (18:50) - Titans at Jets
 (25:25) - Chiefs at Eagles
 (29:15) - Cardinals at Rams
 (34:50) - Seahawks at 49ers
 (38:30) - Ravens at Broncos
 (45:35) - Steelers at Packers
 (50:15) - Buccaneers at Patriots
 (53:50) - Raiders at Chargers
 (58:00) - Fantasy Faceoff + Wheel of Shame
